strings.Value: {n}Linzi bursts into your room. She looks scared. Her face is smeared with soot, and she holds a weapon in her hands.{/n} "Help! Help!"
"The mansion's under attack! We need to help!"
"Some villains broke in and started killing everyone! I barely made it! Hurry, we have to help the guards fight off the attackers, or we'll all be cut down one by one!"
{n}As if to lend credence to Linzi's words, a scream echoes from the hallway.{/n}
"No time for jokes! The mansion's under attack!"
"You can't stay here! The mansion's under attack!"
